Auckland taxi shock: Crown Cabs driver who ‘fleeced’ tourist with $163 fare cried, begged for his job after being confronted https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-taxi-shock-crown-cabs-driver-who-fleeced-tourist-with-163-fare-cried-begged-for-his-job-after-面对/6FAT6HJOGVCNJAAYF7RREBBSDQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-taxi-shock-crown-cabs-driver-who-fleeced-tourist-with-163-fare-cried-begged-for-his-job-after-面对/6FAT6HJOGVCNJAAYF7RREBBSDQ/ Benjamin PlummerA director of an Auckland taxi service has addressed concerns from multiple passengers. Tue, 19 Nov 2024 22:59:59 +0000 It comes after a pensioner from a small town in Central Otago said she felt she was “fleeced” after being charged over $160 for a 20-minute taxi ride in Auckland.
